Texto: 
n/a
in a patient with history of breast cancer, this is metastatic disease until proven otherwise.  a biopsy would be the next step in confirming the diagnosis.
hyperdense l5 vertebral body on plain radiograph that has increased activity on bone scan.
ivory vertebral body
• metastatic disease (lymphoma, breast ca, prostate ca)
• paget's disease
• osteomyelitis
60 year old female with right hip pain.  history of breast cancer in 2005.
